item.title: [7ed] Agonizing Memories
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

item.title: [7ed] Aether Flash
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to it.

item.description:

{T}: Add {W} or {U}. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

item.description:
Creature — Specter

Flying

Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

item.title: [7ed] Abyssal Horror

Creature — Horror

Flying

When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

item.title: [slp] Unholy Heat
item.description:
Instant

Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [slp] Eldritch Evolution
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

item.title: [slp] Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ugin

+2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target.

−X: Exile each permanent with mana value X or less that's one or more colors.

−10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [pone] Drivnod, Carnage Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

{B/P}{B/P}, Exile three creature cards from your graveyard: Put an indestructible counter on Drivnod, Carnage Dominus. ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

item.title: [pone] Soulless Jailer
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Golem

Permanent cards in graveyards can't enter the battlefield.

Players can't cast noncreature spells from graveyards or exile.

item.title: [pone] Soulless Jailer
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Golem

Permanent cards in graveyards can't enter the battlefield.

Players can't cast noncreature spells from graveyards or exile.

item.title: [pone] Solphim, Mayhem Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

{1}{R/P}{R/P}, Discard two cards: Put an indestructible counter on Solphim, Mayhem Dominus. ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)

item.title: [pone] Solphim, Mayhem Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

{1}{R/P}{R/P}, Discard two cards: Put an indestructible counter on Solphim, Mayhem Dominus. ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)

item.title: [pone] Migloz, Maze Crusher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Migloz, Maze Crusher enters the battlefield with five oil counters on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Migloz: It gains vigilance and menace until end of turn.

{2}, Remove two oil counters from Migloz: It gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

{3}, Remove three oil counters from Migloz: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [pone] Migloz, Maze Crusher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Migloz, Maze Crusher enters the battlefield with five oil counters on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Migloz: It gains vigilance and menace until end of turn.

{2}, Remove two oil counters from Migloz: It gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

{3}, Remove three oil counters from Migloz: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [pone] Zopandrel, Hunger Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Reach

At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

{G/P}{G/P}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Put an indestructible counter on Zopandrel, Hunger Dominus. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

item.title: [pone] Darkslick Shores
item.description:
Land

Darkslick Shores enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [pone] Darkslick Shores
item.description:
Land

Darkslick Shores enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [p30a] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [prm] Brushland
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [prm] Surge Engine
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Defender

{U}: Surge Engine loses defender and gains "This creature can't be blocked."

{2}{U}: Surge Engine becomes blue and has base power and toughness 5/4. Activate only if Surge Engine doesn't have defender.

{4}{U}{U}: Draw three cards. Activate only if Surge Engine is blue and only once.

item.title: [prm] Loran of the Third Path
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Vigilance

When Loran of the Third Path enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

{T}: You and target opponent each draw a card.

item.title: [pl23] Rabbit Battery
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Equipment Rabbit

Haste

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

Reconfigure {R} ({R}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

item.title: [pl23] Kwain, Itinerant Meddler
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Rabbit Wizard

{T}: Each player may draw a card, then each player who drew a card this way gains 1 life.

item.title: [pl23] Swiftfoot Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Equip {1}

item.title: [pl23] Ethereal Armor
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

item.title: [pl23] Arcbound Ravager
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Beast

Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Ravager.

Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

item.title: [onc] Ixhel, Scion of Atraxa
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Angel

Flying, vigilance, toxic 2

Corrupted — At the beginning of your end step, each opponent who has three or more poison counters exiles the top card of their library face down. You may look at and play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend many as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

item.title: [onc] Neyali, Suns' Vanguard
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rebel

Attacking tokens you control have double strike.

Whenever one or more tokens you control attack a player, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with a token, you may play that card.

item.title: [pmei] Mental Misstep
item.description:
Instant

({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

Counter target spell with mana value 1.

item.title: [sld] Phyrexian Unlife
item.description:
Enchantment

You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.

As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [sld] Phyrexian Crusader
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Zombie Knight

First strike, protection from red and from white

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [sld] Plague Engineer
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Carrier

Deathtouch

As Plague Engineer enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creatures of the chosen type your opponents control get -1/-1.

item.title: [sld] Ertai, the Corrupted
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Human Wizard

{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Counter target spell.

item.title: [sld] Glissa, the Traitor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Zombie Elf

First strike, deathtouch

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sld] Blighted Agent
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Human Rogue

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

Blighted Agent can't be blocked.

item.title: [sld] K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror Minion

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Lifelink

For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana.

Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth.

item.title: [sld] Glistener Elf
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Warrior

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [sld] Batterskull
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink.

{3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand.

Equip {5}

item.title: [sld] Inkmoth Nexus
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Phyrexian Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [sld] Eldrazi Conscription
item.description:
Tribal Enchantment — Eldrazi Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

item.title: [sld] Deafening Silence
item.description:
Enchantment

Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.

item.title: [sld] Counterbalance
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.

item.title: [sld] Hexdrinker
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)

LEVEL 3-7

4/4

Protection from instants

LEVEL 8+

6/6

Protection from everything
